meanings.definition: A dish of marinated raw fish or seafood, typically served as an appetizer.
meanings.sent1: The seviches at the party were a hit among the guests.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a plate of seviches at the restaurant for a light meal.
meanings.sent3: The seviches looked so fancy, I almost didn't want to eat them.
meanings.sent4: Her talent in making seviches was like creating edible art.
meanings.sent5: The freshness of the seviches made my taste buds dance with delight.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or consuming seviches.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the seviches-making process with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The seviches event brought together food enthusiasts from all around.
meanings.sent3: Their seviches-eating contest was a messy but fun affair.
meanings.sent4: The seviches ritual before dinner became a cherished tradition.
meanings.sent5: The joy of seviches shared with loved ones created lasting memories.
